summary: Small fixes and addition for an enjoyable Requiem gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6]Requiem - Addendum[/size][/b]

This mod adds some crafting recipes to Requiem, changes some small gameplay aspects and improves the general atmosphere.

[size=5]Gameplay Tweaks[/size]

[list]
[*][url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Nimhe]Nimhe[/url] now always spawns as a Giant Frostbite Spider.
[*]Collision for Dead Bodies (Makes Dead body Collision obsolete)
[*]Enemy AI (Same as Hard-Times/ERSO)
[*]No Glowing effect on your body when you have an active Magic Effect
[*]NPCs Walk up and downstairs now in buildings
[*]Remove Delay between lines when talking to NPCs. This makes conversation flow more Naturally
[*]More Active AI in Combat
[*]No more 5 Free Skill points on every skill you have. You still get your Racial Bonus.
[*]No weird Dance Animations for People/Creatures/Dragons/Riekling deaths
[*]No Music Reward Sounds anymore
[/list]

[size=5]Brews and Tonics[/size]

It adds two recipes that are very similar to Healing Poultices: Arcane Brew and Stamina Tonic. They can be crafted at any Cooking Pot, andÂ regenerate (respectively) Magicka and Stamina, in a similar way to what a poultice does. Just like a poultice, they won't work in combat (they will work, however, while sprinting or swimming).

Keep in mind that in order to create these 2 items, you'll need to know how to make them. The old "Healing Poultice" recipe note (you can find one on Arcadia's counter) was changed to accommodate also these 2 new recipes. Read it, and you'll be good to go (no, you don't need to steal or buy it, just read it to acquire the required knowledge).

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Arcane Brew[/size][/color]
[i]Only mages could think of mixing salt with boiled wine... Add to that mixture a couple of mountain flowers, and you'll get a disgusting (yet slightly) alcoholic beverage that will keep your mind more focused, allowing you to recuperate magicka faster.[/i]

Recipe (Cooking Pot): Wine (any non-DLC wine) (1), Salt (1), Red Mountain Flower (3)

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Stamina Tonic[/size][/color]
[i]A tasty infusion obtained by mixing and mead, snowberries and mountain flowers. The result is a sweet, energetic drink that can greatly boost your endurance for around one hour. It is usually taken as a remedy against fatigue and stress.[/i]

Recipe (Cooking Pot): Mead (any non-DLC mead) (1), Snowberries (2), Purple Mountain Flower (3)

[size=5]Other Crafts[/size]

[size=4]Powdered Mammoth Tusk[/size]
It always bothered me that you could find Mammoth Tusks but you won't be able to grind them to powder... This recipe will yield 3 Powdered Mammoth Tusk

Recipe (Smelter): Mammoth Tusk (1)

[size=5]Load order[/size][list]
[*]<Other mods>
[*]Requiem
[*]<Requiem patches>
[*][color=#ff0000][b]Requiem - Addendum (this mod)[/b][/color]
[*]Alternate Start - Live Another Life
[*]Requiem for the Indifferent
[/list]

[size=5]Installation[/size]
Add and activate the Requiem - Addendum.esp file.
It is completely safe to add the plugin mid-game.

[size=5]Uninstallation[/size]
Deactivate and/or delete the Requiem - Addendum.esp file.
It is completely safe to remove the plugin mid-game.
